snippet: Michigan’s defensive coordinator, Greg Mattison, and head coach, Brady Hoke, first coached together in 1984; their team is 10-2 heading into Tuesday’s Sugar Bowl against Virginia Tech.
abstract: Profile of Michigan defensive coordinator Greg Mattison, who left the NFL to return to Michigan this season under longtime friend and head coach Brady Hoke; Michigan's defensive rebirth under Mattison is primary reason team is 10-2 heading into Sugar Bowl against Virginia Tech.
